page.title: 20A DARLINGTON BRIDESMAID
page.content: The best day in my life was being a bridesmaid .A bridesmaid's job is to keep by the bride when needed for things like holding her flowers.After breakfast my hair was put up at the hairdresser's salon before rushing home to put on my bridesmaids dress.It was long, peach coloured, with a floral pattern. The flowers were late, arriving just before we drove to church in the old fashioned Rolls Royce car. I carried a basket of white carnations. On my head, I wore a half band of tiny peach flowers.The bride's long dress was a Victorian style white lace with a short veil.She tripped over her dress hem in the half hour service making us laugh. The reception was held at a hotel. After a three course meal we had a glass of champagne and drank a toast.
